title: The Pretty Spring Color Trend That Will Add a Trendy Touch to Your Spring 2025 Wardrobe
excerpt: Romantic and pretty mint green was spotted all over the spring/summer 2025 runways. See and shop our favorite mint green pieces of the spring season.
text: One of the easiest (and my personal favorite) ways to reinvigorate my wardrobe for a new season is by adding a fresh touch of color to my ensembles. Naturally, we've already been sharing all the chicest and most exciting color trends that dominated on the SS25 runways that we can expect to see all over our favorite fashion people—and feeds this spring. A few weeks ago, I covered some of the pretty color trends of spring 2025, and I was particularly enamored with one—perhaps, because it felt so fresh and unexpected and we haven't seen it in the spotlight for some time. I'm talking about refreshing, romantic, and calming mint green.Though less talked about among the fashion crowd this season than powder pink or butter yellow, mint was no less dominant on the spring runways, appearing in sheer, chiffon, lace, and romantic layers at Fendi, Sportmax, Erdem, and Chanel to name but a few. The pretty shade is guaranteed to add a fresh and trendy touch to your spring/summer outfits. Keep scrolling for visual inspiration from the runways and then shop our favorite mint green pieces of the season.Mint Green on the Runways:(Image credit: Launchmetrics Spotlight/Fendi)(Image credit: Launchmetrics Spotlight/Ermdem)(Image credit: Launchmetrics Spotlight/Chanel)(Image credit: Launchmetrics Spotlight/Sportmax)(Image credit: Chloe/Launchmetrics Spotlight)Shop Our Favorite Mint Green Pieces: A subtle shimmery and sheer take on the color trend—just like we saw on many of the SS25 runways. A chic way to add the color to your basic jeans. Cult Gaia Sai Printed Silk Maxi Skirt Rabanne Patterned Cotton Top Give the color a casual-cool touch and opt for stripes. Frankie Shop Verna Semi Sheer Midi Skirt We're all about mint green in sheer fabrics. Loeffler Randall Leonie Crystal Mesh Ballet Flats Erdem Embroidered Cotton Coat MACHETE Grande Heirloom Claw in Mint Shell Checker For a subtle take on the trend, opt for a chic accessory. Kimchi Blue Rachel Pearl Embellished Button Cardigan Extra pretty with the pearl buttons. Comme Si Silk-Charmeuse Pants Silk pants you can dress up or down. Reformation Noem Satin Dress A vintage-inspired dreamy dress. Melie Bianco The Brigitte Satchel by Melie Bianco: Oversized Edition Bec + Bridge Ilora Knit Mini Dress I could see myself wearing this with flat sandals on my summer vacation. Shopbop Alexis Constance Petite Oval Bag Vintage Bias Cut Mint Dress Selected by Anna Corinna This vintage find looks like it could have come straight off the spring runway. H&M giving us a great styling tip—wear the color with metallic silver. Vince Sequined Overlay Midi Skirt A subtle mint green sparkle. Intimately In This Groove Mini Slip A silky lace slip oozes romance. adidas Gazelle Indoor "Semi Green Spark" Sneakers Don't overlook a mint green pair of sneaks. jcrew Cashmere Shrunken Crewneck Sweater I'll be styling this sweater exactly like the model. Sabina Musayev Savannah Top The perfect summer vacation top. Find Me Now Mariposa Lace Backless Slip Free People Dreamland Solid Tunic Lean into a boho look with this free-spirited blouse. html:
One of the easiest (and my personal favorite) ways to reinvigorate my wardrobe for a new season is by adding a fresh touch of color to my ensembles. Naturally, we've already been sharing all the chicest and most exciting color trends that dominated on the SS25 runways that we can expect to see all over our favorite fashion people—and feeds this spring. A few weeks ago, I covered some of the pretty color trends of spring 2025, and I was particularly enamored with one—perhaps, because it felt so fresh and unexpected and we haven't seen it in the spotlight for some time. I'm talking about refreshing, romantic, and calming mint green.

Though less talked about among the fashion crowd this season than powder pink or butter yellow, mint was no less dominant on the spring runways, appearing in sheer, chiffon, lace, and romantic layers at Fendi, Sportmax, Erdem, and Chanel to name but a few. The pretty shade is guaranteed to add a fresh and trendy touch to your spring/summer outfits. Keep scrolling for visual inspiration from the runways and then shop our favorite mint green pieces of the season.

Mint Green on the Runways:

Shop Our Favorite Mint Green Pieces:
